00059     template<typename T>
00060     class ValueDataSource
00061         : public AssignableDataSource<T>
00062     {
00063     protected:
00064         mutable typename DataSource<T>::value_t mdata;
00065 
00066     public:
00070         ~ValueDataSource();
00071 
00072         typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<ValueDataSource<T> > shared_ptr;
00073 
00074         ValueDataSource( T data );
00075 
00076         ValueDataSource( );
00077 
00078         typename DataSource<T>::result_t get() const
00079         {
00080             return mdata;
00081         }
00082 
00083         typename DataSource<T>::result_t value() const
00084         {
00085             return mdata;
00086         }
00087 
00088         void set( typename AssignableDataSource<T>::param_t t );
00089 
00090         typename AssignableDataSource<T>::reference_t set()
00091         {
00092             return mdata;
00093         }
00094 
00095         typename AssignableDataSource<T>::const_reference_t rvalue() const
00096         {
00097             return mdata;
00098         }
00099 
00100         virtual ValueDataSource<T>* clone() const;
00101 
00102         virtual ValueDataSource<T>* copy( std::map<const base::DataSourceBase*, base::DataSourceBase*>& replace ) const;
00103     };

00210     class ReferenceDataSource
00211         : public AssignableDataSource<T>, public Reference
00212     {
00213         // a pointer to a value_t
00214         T* mptr;
00215     public:
00219         ~ReferenceDataSource();
00220 
00221         typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<ReferenceDataSource<T> > shared_ptr;
00222 
00223         ReferenceDataSource( typename AssignableDataSource<T>::reference_t ref );
00224 
00225         void setReference(void* ref)
00226         {
00227             mptr = static_cast<T*>(ref);
00228         }
00229         void setReference(base::DataSourceBase::shared_ptr dsb)
00230         {
00231             typename AssignableDataSource<T>::shared_ptr ads = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<AssignableDataSource<T> >(dsb);
00232             if (ads) mptr = &ads->set();
00233         }
00234

00236         {
00237             return *mptr;
00238         }

00242             return *mptr;
00243         }

00249             return *mptr;

00254             return *mptr;

00509         template<typename T>
00510         class ActionAliasDataSource
00511             : public DataSource<T>
00512         {
00513             base::ActionInterface* action;
00514             typename DataSource<T>::shared_ptr alias;
00515         public:
00516             typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<ActionAliasDataSource<T> > shared_ptr;
00517 
00518             ActionAliasDataSource(base::ActionInterface* act, DataSource<T>* ds)
00519             : action(act), alias(ds)
00520               {}
00521 
00522             ~ActionAliasDataSource() { delete action; }
00523 
00524             bool evaluate() const {
00525                 // since get() may return a copy, we override evaluate() to
00526                 // call alias->get() with alias->evaluate().
00527                 action->readArguments();
00528                 bool r = action->execute();
00529                 action->reset();
00530                 // alias may only be evaluated after action was executed.
00531                 alias->evaluate();
00532                 return r;
00533             }
00534 
00535             typename DataSource<T>::result_t get() const
00536             {
00537                 action->readArguments();
00538                 action->execute();
00539                 action->reset();
00540                 return alias->get();
00541             }
00542 
00543             typename DataSource<T>::result_t value() const
00544             {
00545                 return alias->value();
00546             }
00547 
00548             typename DataSource<T>::const_reference_t rvalue() const
00549             {
00550                 return alias->rvalue();
00551             }
00552 
00553             virtual void reset() { alias->reset(); }
00554 
00555             virtual ActionAliasDataSource<T>* clone() const {
00556                 return new ActionAliasDataSource(action, alias.get());
00557             }
00558             virtual ActionAliasDataSource<T>* copy( std::map<const base::DataSourceBase*, base::DataSourceBase*>& alreadyCloned ) const {
00559                 return new ActionAliasDataSource( action->copy(alreadyCloned), alias->copy(alreadyCloned) );
00560             }
00561         };

00570             class ActionAliasAssignableDataSource
00571                 : public AssignableDataSource<T>
00572             {
00573                 base::ActionInterface* action;
00574                 typename AssignableDataSource<T>::shared_ptr alias;
00575             public:
00576                 typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<ActionAliasDataSource<T> > shared_ptr;
00577 
00578                 ActionAliasAssignableDataSource(base::ActionInterface* act, AssignableDataSource<T>* ds)
00579                 : action(act), alias(ds)
00580                   {}
00581 
00582                 ~ActionAliasAssignableDataSource() { delete action;}
00583 
00584                 bool evaluate() const {
00585                     // since get() may return a copy, we override evaluate() to
00586                     // call alias->get() with alias->evaluate().
00587                     action->readArguments();
00588                     bool r = action->execute();
00589                     action->reset();
00590                     // alias may only be evaluated after action was executed.
00591                     alias->evaluate();
00592                     return r;
00593                 }
00594

00596                 {
00597                     action->readArguments();
00598                     action->execute();
00599                     action->reset();
00600                     return alias->get();
00601                 }

00614                     return alias->set();

00623 
00624                 virtual ActionAliasAssignableDataSource<T>* clone() const {
00625                     return new ActionAliasAssignableDataSource(action, alias.get());
00626                 }
00627                 virtual ActionAliasAssignableDataSource<T>* copy( std::map<const base::DataSourceBase*, base::DataSourceBase*>& alreadyCloned ) const {

00680   template<typename function>
00681   class BinaryDataSource
00682     : public DataSource< typename remove_cr<typename function::result_type>::type >
00683   {
00684     typedef typename remove_cr<typename function::result_type>::type value_t;
00685     typedef typename remove_cr<typename function::first_argument_type>::type  first_arg_t;
00686     typedef typename remove_cr<typename function::second_argument_type>::type second_arg_t;
00687     typename DataSource<first_arg_t>::shared_ptr mdsa;
00688     typename DataSource<second_arg_t>::shared_ptr mdsb;
00689     function fun;
00690     mutable value_t mdata;
00691   public:
00692     typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<BinaryDataSource<function> > shared_ptr;
00693 
00698     BinaryDataSource( typename DataSource<first_arg_t>::shared_ptr a,
00699                       typename DataSource<second_arg_t>::shared_ptr b,
00700                       function f )
00701       : mdsa( a ), mdsb( b ), fun( f )
00702       {
00703       }
00704 
00705     virtual value_t get() const
00706       {
00707         first_arg_t a = mdsa->get();
00708         second_arg_t b = mdsb->get();
00709         return mdata = fun( a, b );
00710       }
00711 
00712     virtual value_t value() const
00713       {
00714         return mdata;
00715       }
00716 
00717     typename DataSource<value_t>::const_reference_t rvalue() const
00718     {
00719         return mdata;
00720     }
00721 
00722     virtual void reset()
00723       {
00724         mdsa->reset();
00725         mdsb->reset();
00726       }
00727 
00728       virtual BinaryDataSource<function>* clone() const
00729       {
00730           return new BinaryDataSource<function>(mdsa.get(), mdsb.get(), fun);
00731       }
00732 
00733       virtual BinaryDataSource<function>* copy( std::map<const base::DataSourceBase*, base::DataSourceBase*>& alreadyCloned ) const {
00734           return new BinaryDataSource<function>( mdsa->copy( alreadyCloned ), mdsb->copy( alreadyCloned ), fun );
00735       }
00736   };
00737 
00743   template <typename function>
00744   class UnaryDataSource
00745     : public DataSource<typename remove_cr<typename function::result_type>::type>
00746   {
00747     typedef typename remove_cr<typename function::result_type>::type value_t;
00748     typedef typename remove_cr<typename function::argument_type>::type arg_t;
00749     typename DataSource<arg_t>::shared_ptr mdsa;
00750     function fun;
00751     mutable value_t mdata;
00752   public:
00753     typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<UnaryDataSource<function> > shared_ptr;
00754 
00759     UnaryDataSource( typename DataSource<arg_t>::shared_ptr a, function f )
00760       : mdsa( a ), fun( f )
00761       {
00762       }
00763 
00764     virtual value_t get() const
00765       {
00766         return mdata = fun( mdsa->get() );
00767       }
00768 
00769     virtual value_t value() const
00770       {
00771         return mdata;
00772       }
00773 
00774     typename DataSource<value_t>::const_reference_t rvalue() const
00775     {
00776         return mdata;
00777     }
00778 
00779 
00780     void reset()
00781       {
00782         mdsa->reset();
00783       }
00784 
00785     virtual UnaryDataSource<function>* clone() const
00786       {
00787           return new UnaryDataSource<function>(mdsa.get(), fun);
00788       }
00789 
00790     virtual UnaryDataSource<function>* copy( std::map<const base::DataSourceBase*, base::DataSourceBase*>& alreadyCloned ) const {
00791           return new UnaryDataSource<function>( mdsa->copy( alreadyCloned ), fun );
00792       }
00793   };
00794 
00802   template<typename function>
00803   class NArityDataSource
00804     : public DataSource<typename remove_cr<typename function::result_type>::type>
00805   {
00806       typedef typename remove_cr<typename function::result_type>::type value_t;
00807       typedef typename remove_cr<typename function::argument_type>::type  arg_t;
00808       mutable std::vector<arg_t> margs;
00809       std::vector<typename DataSource<arg_t>::shared_ptr > mdsargs;
00810       function fun;
00811       mutable value_t mdata;
00812   public:
00813       typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<NArityDataSource<function> > shared_ptr;
00814 
00819       NArityDataSource( function f = function() )
00820           : fun( f )
00821       {
00822       }
00823 
00828       NArityDataSource( function f, const std::vector<typename DataSource<arg_t>::shared_ptr >& dsargs )
00829           : margs( dsargs.size() ), mdsargs(dsargs), fun( f )
00830       {
00831       }
00832 
00833       void add( typename DataSource<arg_t>::shared_ptr ds ) {
00834           mdsargs.push_back(ds);
00835           margs.push_back( ds->value() );
00836       }
00837 
00838       virtual value_t get() const
00839       {
00840           assert( mdsargs.size() == margs.size() );
00841           for( unsigned int i=0; i !=mdsargs.size(); ++i)
00842               margs[i] = mdsargs[i]->get();
00843           return mdata = fun( margs );
00844       }
00845 
00846       virtual value_t value() const
00847         {
00848           return mdata;
00849         }
00850 
00851       typename DataSource<value_t>::const_reference_t rvalue() const
00852       {
00853           return mdata;
00854       }
00855 
00856       virtual void reset()
00857       {
00858           for( unsigned int i=0; i !=mdsargs.size(); ++i)
00859               mdsargs[i]->reset();
00860       }
00861 
00862       virtual NArityDataSource<function>* clone() const
00863       {
00864           return new NArityDataSource<function>(fun, mdsargs);
00865       }
00866 
00867       virtual NArityDataSource<function>* copy( std::map<const base::DataSourceBase*, base::DataSourceBase*>& alreadyCloned ) const {
00868           std::vector<typename DataSource<arg_t>::shared_ptr > newargs( mdsargs.size() );
00869           for( unsigned int i=0; i !=mdsargs.size(); ++i)
00870               newargs[i] = mdsargs[i]->copy(alreadyCloned);
00871           return new NArityDataSource<function>( fun, newargs );
00872       }
00873   };
00874     }
00875 }
